name: Diazepam
description: Used to treat anxiety, muscle spasms, and seizures. It also provides sedation before medical procedures.

name: Lorazepam
description: Prescribed for managing anxiety disorders and for sedation before surgery.

name: Lormetazepam
description: Used for short-term treatment of insomnia, with sedative and anxiolytic properties.

name: Lorazepam-diazepam combination
description: Used for anxiety and as a sedative.

name: Alprazolam
description: Used to treat anxiety and panic disorders by promoting a calming effect.

name: Clonazepam
description: Treats anxiety, panic disorders, and seizures; also used as a sedative.

name: Phenobarbital
description: A barbiturate used for seizure control and as a sedative for anxiety or insomnia.

name: Midazolam
description: Used for pre-surgical sedation and for inducing sleepiness during medical procedures.

name: Zolpidem
description: Primarily prescribed for short-term treatment of insomnia by helping patients fall asleep.

name: Temazepam
description: Used to treat insomnia by helping patients fall and stay asleep.

name: Eszopiclone
description: Prescribed for insomnia; helps with falling asleep and maintaining sleep.

name: Triazolam
description: A short-acting benzodiazepine used to treat severe insomnia.

name: Chloral Hydrate
description: Used as a sedative and hypnotic for short-term treatment of insomnia and anxiety.

name: Dexmedetomidine
description: Used for sedation in intensive care settings and during medical procedures.

name: Ketamine
description: Used in controlled environments for sedation and pain relief, particularly in emergency or surgical settings.

name: Etomidate
description: A short-acting sedative used for induction of anesthesia and sedation in critically ill patients.

name: Propofol
description: Commonly used for induction and maintenance of anesthesia or sedation in medical procedures.
